meanings.definition: Provide a title or explanation for an image or video.
meanings.sent1: She captioned the photo with a funny description.
meanings.sent2: The news channel always captions their videos for viewers.
meanings.sent3: He captioned the picture with a silly joke.
meanings.sent4: The artist captioned his masterpiece with a heartfelt message.
meanings.sent5: Remember to caption your photos to make them more interesting.

meanings.definition: To add captions to a piece of media for accessibility purposes.
meanings.sent1: The team captioned the video for the hearing-impaired audience.
meanings.sent2: It is important to caption online videos for better understanding.
meanings.sent3: She captioned the movie with subtitles for her friends.
meanings.sent4: The company captioned their promotional video to reach a wider audience.
meanings.sent5: Captioning videos helps make content accessible to everyone.
